aboutPreview.title: Who We Are
aboutPreview.text: We are an insurance agency created to make life easier for people living in the United States. We believe insurance should not be complicated or expensive. Our role is to represent you, not the insurance company. That is why we compare several carriers and recommend only what truly fits your needs.

step4.description: We stay by your side throughout the year.

hero.title: Personal Insurance Designed to Protect What Matters Most

intro.text: Life brings unexpected situations. Our personal insurance options give you peace of mind, financial protection, and the security your family deserves. As an independent agency, we compare multiple carriers to find the right coverage for your needs. Whether you are protecting your vehicle, your home, or your personal assets, we make the process simple and stress-free.

details.auto: Auto insurance protects you financially in case of accidents, theft, or damage to your vehicle. It can include liability coverage, collision, comprehensive, and more. Get the coverage you need at the best price by comparing multiple carriers.
details.home: Homeowners insurance protects your home and personal belongings against damage from fire, storms, theft, and other covered events. It also includes liability protection if someone is injured on your property.
details.renters: Renters insurance protects your personal belongings in a rented apartment or home. It covers theft, fire, water damage, and includes liability protection. It's affordable and essential for tenants.
details.condo: Condo insurance is designed specifically for condo owners, covering your unit's interior, personal belongings, and liability. It complements the condo association's master policy.
details.umbrella: Umbrella insurance provides additional liability coverage beyond your auto and home policies. It protects your assets and future earnings in case of major claims or lawsuits.
details.life: Life insurance provides financial security for your loved ones in case of your passing. It can cover funeral costs, debts, mortgage payments, and provide income replacement for your family.
details.flood: Flood insurance protects your home and belongings from flood damage, which is typically not covered by standard homeowners insurance. Essential for properties in flood-prone areas.
details.motorcycle: Motorcycle insurance protects you and your bike with liability, collision, comprehensive, and medical coverage. Required by law in most states and essential for your safety and financial protection.
details.rv: RV and travel trailer insurance protects your recreational vehicle with coverage for liability, collision, comprehensive damage, and personal belongings inside the RV. Perfect for road trips and adventures.

cta.title: Protecting your family starts with the right insurance.

hero.title: Business Insurance That Protects Your Company, Your Team, and Your Future

intro.text: Running a business comes with risks. The right insurance is essential to protect operations, employees, and assets. As an independent agency, we work with multiple carriers to find the exact coverage your business needs, without overpaying. From liability protection to employee coverage, we make the process clear, fast, and stress-free.

details.liability: General liability insurance protects your business from claims of bodily injury, property damage, and advertising injury. Essential coverage for any business that interacts with customers or the public.
details.property: Commercial property insurance covers your business building, equipment, inventory, and furniture against fire, theft, vandalism, and natural disasters. Protects your physical assets and keeps your business running.
details.workers: Workers' compensation insurance covers medical expenses and lost wages for employees injured on the job. Required by law in most states and protects both your team and your business from costly lawsuits.
details.auto: Commercial auto insurance protects vehicles used for business purposes. Covers liability, collision, comprehensive damage, and medical expenses for drivers and passengers.
details.bop: A Business Owner's Policy (BOP) combines general liability and commercial property insurance in one convenient, cost-effective package. Ideal for small and medium-sized businesses.
details.professional: Professional liability insurance (Errors & Omissions) protects your business from claims of negligence, mistakes, or failure to deliver services. Essential for consultants, contractors, and service professionals.
details.umbrella: Commercial umbrella insurance provides additional liability coverage beyond your primary business policies. Protects your company from major claims and lawsuits that exceed standard policy limits.
details.cyber: Cyber liability insurance protects your business from data breaches, cyberattacks, and digital security incidents. Covers legal fees, notification costs, credit monitoring, and regulatory fines.
details.flood: Commercial flood insurance protects your business property and contents from flood damage, which is typically not covered by standard commercial property policies. Critical for businesses in flood-prone areas.

cta.title: Your business deserves security, stability, and peace of mind.

hero.title: Workers' Compensation Insurance That Protects Your Employees and Your Business

intro.text: Accidents can happen in any workplace. Workers' Compensation provides financial protection for employees and legal protection for your business. As an independent agency, we compare multiple carriers to find the right policy for your company while keeping costs under control.

details.medical: Covers all medical costs related to workplace injuries, including emergency care, hospital stays, surgeries, medications, and ongoing treatments. Ensures your employees get the care they need quickly.
details.wages: Provides partial wage replacement for employees unable to work due to job-related injuries or illnesses. Typically covers a percentage of their regular salary while they recover.
details.disability: Offers financial support for employees who suffer permanent or temporary disabilities from workplace accidents. Includes both partial and total disability benefits.
details.rehab: Covers physical therapy, occupational therapy, vocational training, and other rehabilitation services to help injured employees recover and return to work as soon as possible.
details.employer: Protects your business from lawsuits filed by employees for workplace injuries. Covers legal defense costs and settlements if an employee claims negligence or unsafe working conditions.
details.illness: Provides coverage for illnesses caused by workplace conditions, such as respiratory problems, chemical exposure, repetitive stress injuries, and other occupational diseases.

cta.title: Protect your workers and your business with the right coverage.

hero.title: Insurance Made Simple, Clear and Accessible for Everyone

agency.title: About Our Agency
agency.text: We understand the challenges of living and building a life in the United States. As an independent insurance agency, we work with multiple trusted carriers, allowing us to compare prices and coverage to find the plan that truly fits your needs. We represent you, not the insurance companies.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to help individuals, families, and businesses find the right insurance without stress or unnecessary costs. We listen, compare, explain, and guide so you feel confident every step of the way.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.simple: We make the insurance process simple and transparent.
commitment.affordable: We find affordable options without sacrificing protection.
commitment.multilingual: We offer support in English, Portuguese, and Spanish.
commitment.available: We stay available whenever you need us.

different.title: What Makes Us Different
different.independent: Independent agency with access to multiple carriers
different.clear: Clear communication in your preferred language
different.customer: Customer-first philosophy in everything we do
different.personalized: Personalized recommendations tailored to your needs

cta.title: We are here to help you feel protected and confident.
